# pointOnPage

**Instance Property**

A DOM point with the coordinate of the event on the page.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly pointOnPage?: DOMPoint | undefined;
```

## Discussion

You can use this property — which is an `(x, y)` coordinate — to derive a latitude and longitude coordinate on the map using [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/convertPointOnPageToCoordinate].
title: pointOnPage
